{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Apple |model=Apple TV |revision=4k (A1842) |price=179 |est_release_date=09/22/2017 |fcc_date=09/12/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=media streamer |fcc_id=BCGA1842 |ic_id=579C-A1842 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Apple |cpu1_model=A10X;343S00198; |fla1=32 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=THGBX6G8D2LLDXG |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9HCNNNBRUMLQR |ram2=1 GiB |ram2_brand=SK hynix |ram2_model=H9HCNNN8KUMLQR |wi1_module=Murata 339S00381 <!-- Type 1SP ? --> |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43572 <!-- BCM4339/BCM4361 ? --> |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_chip1_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip1_model=BCM57762 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=DisplayPort 1.4 to HDMI 2.0 Converter;Megachips;MCDP2920A4;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 5.0, DFS (slave), HDMI 2.0a, IR receiver, fan, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} :{{ProductPage|https://www.apple.com/apple-tv-4k/}} *[https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2017/09/apple-tv-4k-brings-home-the-magic-of-cinema-with-4k-and-hdr/ Press Release] :32GB: $179 :64GB: $199 <!--According to the Test Report document submitted to the FCC there are two vendors that provide WiFi/Bluetooth radio modules with the same mechanical outline. At least one of the modules is likely an Intel 9260/9560.--> Comes with an [[Apple Siri Remote (A1962)]]
===Links=== * [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Apple+TV+4K+Teardown/97511 ''Apple TV 4K Teardown'' on '''iFixit'''] * [https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT200008 ''Identify your Apple TV model'' at '''Apple''']
